views.gui.components

Class JEventDisplay

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • views.gui.components.JEventDisplay
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.Scrollable

    public class JEventDisplay
extends javax.swing.JComponent
implements javax.swing.Scrollable
    JEventDisplay is custom component designed to show users chosen week events. It's scrollable if window is to small and dates under day disappear if row is too narrow. It is possible to change display range in settings. CalendarController manages displayed week and display range.
    Author:
    laiqu
    See Also:
    CalendarController, Serialized Form
